title: Fahrenheit 9/11
creator_credit: Fellowship Adventure Group, BIM Distribuzione, Michael Moore, Jim Czarnecki and Kathleen Glynn
brief_description: Michael Moore’s view on what happened to the United States after September 11 and how the Bush Administration allegedly used the tragic event to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

creator_credit_for_label: Fellowship Adventure Group, BIM Distribuzione, Michael Moore, Jim Czarnecki and Kathleen Glynn
